card_game_24.utilities

Class PlayerXMLFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • card_game_24.utilities.PlayerXMLFileWriter

  • public class PlayerXMLFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerCSVFileWriter.java This class provides an abstraction to write our database. Using XML! For Xtra credit. 
        Project: 24 Card Game
    Platform: jdk 1.8.0_14; NetBeans IDE 8.1; Windows 10
    Course: CS 143
    Created on May 10, 2016, 2:09 PM
    Revised on May 23, 2016, 5:30 PM

      Constructors

      Creates an empty XML file at the location of our choice.
